title: Educational Video Design for Mobile-Based Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Learners require intermediate language proficiency for daily life and work, preferring self-directed learning in mobile environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain language grammatical structures using segmented video content with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can reconstruct educational video content with three examples by applying self-explanation strategies.
Learners can create summary notes within 10 minutes of video learning using a three-step process (segmentation-explanation-application).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
